==Chinese==
{{zh-see|國內}}

----

==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|こく|ない|yomi=o}}

===Etymology 1===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=こくない}} {{m|ltc|國內}} ({{IPAchar|/kwok nwojH/}}, “country inside”). Compare modern {{cog|zh|国内|tr=guónèi}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{ja-pron|こくない|y=o|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|こくない}}

# [[inside]] the [[country]], [[domestic]]

=====Antonyms=====
* {{ja-r|国外|こくがい}}: [[outside]] of the country, [[overseas]]

===Etymology 2===
Originally a compound of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=くぬち}} {{compound|lang=ja|sort=くぬち|国|tr1=kuni|t1=country|内|tr2=うち|t2=inside}}. Already appears in the abbreviated form in the [[w:Man'yōshū|''Man'yōshū'']].

{{IPAchar|/kuni uchi/}} > {{IPAchar|/kunuchi/}}

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[kɯᵝnɯᵝt͡ɕi]}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|国中}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|くぬち}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=くぬち}} the [[interior]] of a [[country]]; [[within]] a country's [[border]]s
